description: This file defines the implementation of the DirectOutput class, which is responsible for outputting messages either to syslog or to the console, based on internal configuration. It includes a method 'Output' that handles message printing.

classes.name: DirectOutput
classes.description: A class responsible for outputting messages either to syslog or to console.

methods.name: void Output(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & messageInfo,const Core::Messaging::IEvent * message) const
methods.description: Outputs a message to the chosen output medium, either syslog or console, based on internal settings.

ctags.name: Output
